Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Baseball \Base"ball"\, n. 1. A game of ball, so called from the bases or bounds (four in number) which designate the circuit which each player must endeavor to make after striking the ball. [1913 Webster]
2. The ball used in this game. [1913 Webster]

baseball n 1: a ball game played with a bat and ball between two teams of 9 players; teams take turns at bat trying to score run; "he played baseball in high school"; "there was a baseball game on every empy lot"; "there was a desire for National League ball in the area"; "play ball!" [syn: {baseball game}, {ball}] 2: a ball used in playing baseball
